imgText: The Eletre claimed victory in GQ magazine’s Car Of The Year awards, winning the prestigious 'SUV of the Year' title 2023.
With its porous design, inspired by Lotus DNA, the Eletre doesn’t fight air. It breathes air.
The Evija-derived aerodynamics guide air over and through its body for extra downforce and speed.
The active aero works to create optimum aerodynamic efficiency.
